title: What is your favorite movie soundtrack or original song? - Quora

response.answer_text: My favorite - The Replacement Killers original movie soundtrack. The music not only fit the movie perfectly, but to this day I still find it to be an amazing background listening soundtrack as well as engaging enough to make you acknowledge the sounds. When I can’t access the mood of a room or just want a little something to enhance game night without the drama of asking what people want to listen to, worrying about offending someone, or having to deal with a not so great song coming up on shuffle — yep, I put on The Replacement Killers soundtrack.
